meta.description: A map based tool to create a postcard showing the landuse distribution in your neighborhood

description:
Here you can create a postcard showing the distribution of land use in your neighbourhood. Simply move the map of Vienna or search for a location. You can also change the text on the postcard.

The map shows how the area is used, but not by whom it can be used. It is therefore possible, for example, that some green or sports areas shown are not accessible to the public. Unfortunately, there is only very limited open data available on the public accessibility.

footer.background: Grätzlfarben was initially developed under the name 'Kiezcolors' by ODIS and CityLAB Berlin. The Research Unit Cartography at TU Wien adapted it for Vienna. You can find the code to this project on GitHub.
